value.title: Sweden's Ericsson, Telia present self-driving bus ahead of 5G spectrum auction
value.excerpt: Telecoms gear maker Ericsson and mobile operator Telia on Thursday showcased a self-driving, electric bus in Stockholm as the companies look at new business areas ahead of mass deployment of 5G technology.

value.title: Is Your Business Ready To Implement AI?
value.excerpt: It's almost always worth it to start using AI, regardless of company size or industry, because once your enterprise is ready for AI, it's possible to ramp up the number of automated tasks over time and save more and more in time and costs.
